name: Provide - LD44
description:
Provide -A game of life, made for Ludum Dare 44, with "Your life is the currency" as the theme.  A short story simulation of life in general, providing, or not providing, for your loved ones.  Created in 72 hours (really 48 if you count the first game I built and threw away).

Thank you to Pixel Prophecy  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUMFVcnkIM5L4V8fA24C51 for the inspiration and motivation to participate in Ludum Dare.  If you haven't seen his videos, go take a look; amazing talent with all creations, especially video.
